item.title: Mk II - Firebase, Electric Boogaloo
item.description: Refreshing feeds in the back, partying up front. This episode should get pushed to my device and then appear right away in the app.
item.itunes:author: Brady Valentino
item.itunes:summary: Refreshing feeds in the back, partying up front. This episode should get pushed to my device and then appear right away in the app.
